name: Temple
blurb: Locus of divine kingship and human silence; judgment discourse ends in doxological hush.

name: Darius I (Persian king)
blurb: Persian ruler whose regnal year dates Haggai’s messages. His administration frames Yehud’s provincial realities.

name: Ashkelon
blurb: Destined for desolation and later sheepfolds for the remnant.
